projects.title: Multi Page Captive Portal
list: Aimed to showcase a streamlined login experience through different login options.
Developed under TypeScript and Next.js focusing on multi page layout and data persistence between pages.
Also incorporated API calls to Firebase for efficient data retrieval and storage.
To connect via Guest Login: Room: 1001, Last Name: Smith
To connect via Access Code Login: 123456 or 111111
projects.stack: HTML5, TypeScript, Next.js, and Styled Components (CSS-in-JS)
